loans.name: Josesh Farid

texts.en: Josesh, a 30-year-old security guard, lives with his family in his hometown of Imperial. When he is not working, he enjoys playing soccer on the weekends with friends, including his best friend with whom he also works. Josesh successfully completed his high school degree, but was unable to start a post-secondary education in his preferred field, administration. Thanks to the effort put forth by his parents, in combination with Josesh's financial contributions, he was able to finish building most of his house. Josesh is grateful to Kiva lenders, with whose support he will be able to finish plastering the outside of his home.

loans.use: to pay for materials to plaster the facade of his home

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to open a restaurant in his home

loans.name: Johana Vannesa

texts.en: Johana, a resident of Imperial, Peru, is 32 years old and a single mother of a 10-year-old son. Currently, Johana works full time in a laundromat where she says she is successful because of her determination. Having completed only one year of secondary education, Johana wishes she could have studied cosmetology. The most important thing for her now is to increase her income in order to support her family and one day realize her dream -- that her son will become a successful professional. To do so, Johana has started a small candy store out of her own home. She will use this loan to purchase a display case for the candy and sweets that she sells. She is grateful to Kiva lenders for their support and will continue to work hard and persevere each day.

loans.use: to purchase a food display cabinet for her business

loans.name: Renzo Luis

texts.en:
Ica, Peru is located in the Sechura Desert about four hours south of Lima, the country's capital, and is hailed by Peruvians as "The Land of the Sun." It is known in Peru for its frequent earthquakes (an 8.4 in 2001 and 8.0 in 2007), its production of grapes, asparagus, and olives, and perhaps most notably, as the source of Peruvian's traditional national drink, Pisco.

In this hot, arid climate resides Renzo, a father of a 2-year-old child. Renzo works full time as a motorbike taxi driver ("mototaxi"), offering his passengers efficiency and security. He transports approximately 15 people per day. In order to maintain his provision of excellent service and safety, he needs to pay for a few fixes to his mototaxi. Renzo will use this loan to change the doors and tires, as well as pay for general maintenance of the vehicle. He hopes that these fixes will help increase his income, which then will allow him to finish building his house -- a dream he hopes to realize within the next year.

loans.use: to cover the maintenance costs of his motorbike taxi

loans.name: Asri Lestari Group

texts.en:
Ni Nyoman is the head of the Asri Lestari group, which is located in west Bali, near the border between Bali and Java. Although most inhabitants there work as a fishermen, the Balinese women still maintain cultural ties to raising pigs for supporting the family income. Ni Nyoman has 2 children and her husband works as a mason.

She will use her loan to purchase 3 superior piglets and feed. Her plan is to manage fattening the piglets. She hopes the price for pigs remains high and she can earn a satisfactory profit. One member could not attend the meeting because she went to the Temple.

loans.use: To purchase three superior piglets and feed

loans.name: Davaadorj

texts.en: Mr. Davaadorj, 36 years old, lives with his wife, daughter, son and mother in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in a Mongolian traditional ger (portable felt dwelling) on a plot of land. He has been driving a truck at a transportation service company since 2011. His wife is a nurse at a hospital. Recently, he purchased a container and transformed it into a house by carving out a window frame and door. In order to create a complete house, which will accommodate all of the family members, he needs to purchase another container. For this reason, he is requesting a loan of 4,000,000 MNT. Conjoining two containers, he will make a comfortable and warm house. The new house will enable the family to burn less coal for heating thus releasing less pollutants into the atmosphere.

loans.use: to purchase another container

loans.name: Tina

texts.en:
Tina is a 57-year-old married woman with 4 children. 
She has a small plantation and grows taro, banana, yam, and breadfruit to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. Tina has requested a loan to buy a backpack sprayer, chemicals, bush-knives, a chain saw, and a wheelbarrow. 
She has been a member of SPBD since 2012. With her profits, Tina will save up for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy a backpack sprayer, chemicals, bush-knives, a chain saw, and a wheelbarrow.

loans.name: Eleitino

texts.en:
Eleitino is a 32-year-old who lives with her partner and 2 children. 
She has a small plantation and grows taro, banana, and yam to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. Eleitino has requested a loan to buy chemicals, a wheelbarrow, a backpack sprayer, fertilizer and barbed wire. to buy chemicals,wheelbarrow,backpack sprayer,fertilizer and barbed wire. 
She has been a member of SPBD since 2012. With her profits, Eleitino hopes to support her family's daily wants and needs.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, a wheelbarrow, a backpack sprayer, fertilizer and barbed wire.

loans.name: Faaiuga

texts.en: Faaiuga is 32 years old and lives with her partner and 2 children. She runs a small business selling pork cakes and pancakes in her village school during breaks and has been doing this for more than 3 years. Faaiuga has requested a loan to buy flour, oil, soy sauce, yeast, and a frying pan. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Faaiuga will used it to support her family financially.

loans.use: to buy flour, oil, soy sauce, yeast and a frying pan.

loans.name: José Adilman

texts.es:
José es un hombre de 60 años de edad, lastimosamente no pudo asistir a la escuela, está acompañado, y su compañera de vida ella realiza los oficios domésticos, tiene tres hijos, pero solo están con él, los nietos. 

 
Tiene 42 años de trabajar en la agricultura lo ha desempeñado, casi toda su vida por lo que goza de muchísima experiencia; fue aprendido por su padre, también tiene bovinos los cuales engorda y posterior vende ,trabaja desde las 4 AM y llega a las 2 PM ya que camina  1KM.


El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar una yunta de novillos, los cuales le servirán para los trabajos agrícolas ahorrándose mucho dinero.

Su deseo es, seguir trabajando siempre en la agricultura y criar bovinos para generar ingresos y que su esposa este con salud; ya que padece de una enfermedad y debe estar siempre en control medico.
texts.en:
José is 60 years old, married and his life partner is a domestic worker. He has three children but only his grandchildren live with him. Unfortunately he could not attend school. He has been working in agriculture for 42 years, almost all his life. So he has a lot of experience. He learned from his father. He also has cattle which he fattens and sells. He has to walk 1 kilometer to work and works from 4am until 2pm.

The loan he is requesting is to buy a pair of oxen, which will help with the farming chores and save a lot of money. His wish is to continue working in agriculture, raising cattle to generate income and that his wife gets better. She has been sick and has been receiving medical attention.

loans.use: to buy a pair of oxen, which will help with the farming chores and save a lot of money.

loans.name: Enrique Octavio

texts.en: Enrique, a 19-year-old quarry worker, resides in the city of Nazca -- a place famous for the legendary Nazca Lines. When Enrique is not hard at work, he enjoys playing soccer with his friends. He has completed his secondary education and hopes to be able to study psychology in the future. Enrique is incredibly grateful to Kiva lenders, whose loan will be used to cover some of the costs he will incur in order to paint his bedroom. This will allow Enrique to feel more comfortable in his own home, which he shares with his family. Enrique's biggest desire is to one day become a homeowner himself.

loans.use: to cover part of the costs of painting his bedroom

loans.name: José Raúl

texts.es:
José es un joven de 27 años de edad, estudio hasta 9° grado, es casado, la esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene un hijo de 4 años aun no estudia, junto con ellos vive su mamá. 

Desde hace 3 años trabaja en  la agricultura, lo aprendió de su padre que desde niño lo llevaba a trabajar, también cría y vende cerdos y bovinos. Para ir a su cultivo se desplaza unos 2 kilómetros, se levanta a las 4 a.m  y regresa a casa a las 1pm


El préstamo que esta solicitando es, para comprar un  novillo para hacer la monta, con esto podrá surquear la tierra y hacer otras actividades con los bueyes y evitar esos costos; ya que ese servicio es bastante costoso

Espera ganar muchas ganancias, con la compra del novillo, debido a que en su hogar desea tener todo lo básico para que su esposa e hijo no les falte nada, en su producción quiere a futuro comprar más bovinos de leche.
texts.en: José is a young 27 year old man.  He completed ninth grade and he is married.  His wife is engaged in housekeeping and they have a four year old son that is not in school yet.  His mother lives with them.  For three years, José has worked in farming, which he learned from his father who took him to work when he was a child.  He also raises pigs and cattle.  To reach his crop, he travels about two kilometers; he rises at 4:00 am and returns home at 1:00 pm.  He is requesting the loan to purchase a young bull for mating.  He will be able to use the bull to plough the land and do other chores with the wagons and avoid these costs as that service is quite expensive.  He hopes to earn a great deal of profits with the purchase of the bull because he wants to have all the basics in his home so that his wife and son don’t lack anything.  He wants to buy more dairy cattle for future production.

loans.use: to purchase a young bull for mating.

loans.name: Tofiga

texts.en:
Tofiga is a 38-year-old married woman with 5 children. 

She has a small plantation and grows taro, banana, and vegetables in a garden to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. Tofiga has requested a loan to buy a shovel, chemicals, backpack sprayer, fertilizer, vegetable seeds and taro roots.
 
She joined SPBD in 2013 to gain access to financial services. With her profits, Tofiga will support her family financially.

loans.use: to buy a shovel, chemicals, backpack sprayer, fertilizer, vegetable seeds and taro roots

loans.name: Battsengel

texts.en: Mrs. Battsengel, 44 years old, lives with her husband, daughter and niece in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The family is currently living in a garage because their house roof and wall is so fragile. She has been mending shoes for a living for about 10 years. Even though her husband's leg is paralyzed, he helps his wife in many ways. Her daughter works at a land register company. As winter is approaching, she wants to renovate her old house because living in the garage in winter is impossible. So she is requesting a loan of 6,000,000 MNT to purchase building materials such as shingles, cement, bricks, planks, fiberglass and foam as well as vacuum insulated windows and hardwood flooring. By doing so, her family will live in a comfortable and warm place as no heat will seep though the walls again. More importantly, they will burn less coal for heating, thus releasing fewer pollutants into the air. The borrower is a very hardworking individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to purchase shingles, cement, bricks, planks and fiberglass

loans.name: Jacinta

texts.en: Jacinta is 39 years old and married with 4 children. She runs a small business selling pancakes in her community and has been doing this for more than 3 years years. Jacinta has requested a loan to buy flour, sugar, oil, an oven, plastic bags, and baking soda. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Jacinta will save more money for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, oil, an oven, plastic bags, and baking soda.

loans.name: Segia

texts.en:
Segia is a 32-year-old married woman with 5 children. 
She has a small plantation and grows taro, banana, and yam to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. Segia has requested a loan to buy a wheelbarrow, a backpack sprayer, barbed wire, and chemicals. She has been a member of SPBD since 2012. With her profits, Segia will renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, a backpack sprayer, barbed wire, and chemicals.

loans.name: Rosa Mistica Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Rosa Mistica está en su Segundo ciclo  del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas se comprometieron a trabajar y a ayudarse entre todas para salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde una de las dieciséis señoras se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, es decir con ingresos muy bajos, pero trabajando por mejorarlo
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Liliana, quien a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y las aplicaciones de los comportamientos vitales de una mujer exitosa ella desea mejorar  su situación de pobreza. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropas, y comenta que la competencia es dura, pero que no se desanima, ya que es la única forma que tiene de ayudar a su familia.
Ella pide esta ayuda para comprar prendas de invierno, ya que estamos en temporada invernal y quiere seguir con sus ventas, que es su única fuente de ingresos.
texts.en:
The Rosa Mistica group is in their second cycle with the women's committee program, where they all promise to work together and help each other to move forward.  They are participating in the poverty elimination survey and one of the sixteen women was found to be below the poverty line, with low income, but working to improve it.

One of the group members is Liliana, who wants to improve her poverty situation with effort, continuous work, and the application of the vital behaviors of a successful woman.  She works selling clothing and says that the competition is hard, but it does not discourage her, since this is the only way she has to help her family.

She is requesting this help to purchase winter clothing since it is winter time and she wants to continue with her sales, since it is her only source of income.

loans.use: to purchase winter clothing to sell.

loans.name: Tirta Nadi Group

texts.en: In order to further enhance their earnings in the field of breeding pigs, the whole group of Tirta Nadi wishes to continue borrowing from MUK in the same amount. They are very satisfied with the services provided, so they agreed to develop this business further. The group chose a new head, Ni Nyoman, and replaced Ni Komang. Ni Nyoman plans to use the loan to buy four superior quality piglets for later sale. The price of pigs remains high. She still expects the assistance of MUK in business consulting. Her profits will be saved for the preparation of her children's education expenses.

loans.use: to purchase four superior piglets

loans.name: Freddy Antonio

texts.es: Freddy es un ciudadano de la comunidad de las nubes # 2 tiene de vivir en esta comnunidad mas de 4 años. En su humilde vivienda vive con su esposa y su hijo de 7 años de edad  el esta en segundo grado de primaria  y asiste a la escuela de la misma comunidad. Freddy para mantener a su familia trabaja en una finca  como jornalero esto le permite poder llevar el sustento del dia dia a su hogar ya que el ingreso del trabajo es fijo. Por las noches en su humilde hogar  se iluminan con candiles candelas lo que es peligroso y perjudicial para la salud especialmente del niño y  gasta a diario en la compra de estos. Es por eso que el solicita se  le ayude en darle el prestamo de este pequeño sistema solar de 12 Watt que le permitira poder tener luz en su hogar compartir con la familia y ayudar en los labores del hogar .
texts.en:
Freddy is a citizen of the community of Las Nubes #2. He has lived in this community for more than four years. In his modest home he lives with his wife and his seven-year-old son, who is in second grade of primary, and attends school in the same community. 

To support his family, Freddy works on a farm as a day laborer. This enables him to support his household, as he has a steady work income.

In the evenings in his modest home the lighting is by candles, which is dangerous and harmful to health; especially that of the children, and he has the expense of buying these every day. That is why he is requesting the help of a loan to buy a small 12-watt solar energy system which will enable him to have light in his home to share with the family and help with the household chores.

loans.use: To buy a solar energy system for his home.

loans.name: Kanykey

texts.ru: Каныкей 21 год, незамужем, проживает с родителями. У Каныкей неоконченное-высшее высшее образование. Каныкей в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, с 2009 года занимается торговлей продуктов питания, начав этот бизнес с 30,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Каныкей, она смогла развить и расширить свой товар, ее деятельность приносит около 15,000 сом KGS в месяц, что служит основой для покрытия расходов на питание и бытовые нужды семьи. Доходы от бизнеса позволили Каныкей расширить свой товарооборот. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Каныкей обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку оптовых продуктов питания для дальнейшей перепродажи. Доходы от кредита помогут Каныкей увеличить товарооборот в продуктовом магазине, а также полученная прибыль поможет улучшить благосостояние семьи.
texts.en:
Kanykey is 21 and single and lives with her parents. She has an unfinished higher education. Kaneykey is the primary income earner in her family and has been engaged in selling food products since 2009, having begun her business with 30,000 KGS. Thanks to Kanykey's hard work, she has been able to develop and expand her business, and her activities bring in about 15,000 KGS per month, which is the main source of payment for her family's groceries and other everyday needs. 

Profits from Kanykey's business have allowed her to broaden her turnover of inventory. With the goal of further development of her business, Kanykey has turned to microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" for a loan of 100,000 KGS to purchase wholesale food products for further resale. Profits from the loan will help Kanykey to increase turnover of inventory in her grocery store; revenue received will also help improve her family's well-being.

loans.use: to buy wholesale food products for resale

loans.name: Batbayar

texts.en: Mr. Batbayar, 25 years old, lives with his mother in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been rendering taxi service to the local people for eight months. Before this, he worked as a truck driver at a copper mine but he quit his job because his mother lived alone in Ulaanbaatar. Using his previous loan, he purchased and installed a heating system in his house. But it was not enough to protect them from the cold winter, and it consumed too much energy. Now he is requesting a loan of 5,000,000 MNT to purchase building and insulation materials, such as bricks, cement, fiberglass and foam in order to repair and insulate his wooden house. As a result, he and his mother will live in a comfortable and warm place where they won't need to burn a lot of coal for heating, which will have a positive impact on the environment as less pollutants will be released into the air.

loans.use: to puchase building and insulation materials

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve the facade of her home.

loans.name: Zarina

texts.ru: Зарина современная и жизнерадостная молодая девушка. Она не замужем и живет с родителями. Зарина более полтора года работает на местном радио. Зарина работает диктором. Она введет развлекательные программы на радио. Зарина в этом году поступила в Таджикский Государственный Университет. Зарина поступила на юридический факультет. Зарина должна оплатить за учебный договор, но не имеет денег. Она запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Zarina is a modern and vivacious young woman. She is not married and lives with her parents. Zarina has been working at the local radio station as a director for more than a year and a half. She introduces entertaining radio shows. This year, Zarina has enrolled in the Faculty of Law at Tajik State National University. She needs to pay for her tuition, but doesn't have the money and is requesting a loan for tuition payments. She awaits your kindness and hopes for your charity.

loans.use: To pay for her university tuition

loans.name: Mendsaikhan

texts.en: Mendsaikhan, 35, lives with his wife and two children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in a Mongolian traditional ger (portable felt dwelling) on a plot of land. He has been transporting goods within the city since 2011. His wife is currently unemployed and looks after their children. Their children both go to elementary school. He is requesting a loan of 2000000 MNT to purchase furniture such as a fridge, a desk and chairs. By doing so, his family will live in a more comfortable place. This borrower is a very hardworking individual who cares deeply for his family.

loans.use: to purchase furniture such as a fridge, a desk and chairs.

loans.name: Allen

texts.en: Allen is a 46-year-old married woman from Talibon, Bohol. She has 4 children. The oldest child is 24 while the youngest is 7. She engages in farming. She grows and sells rice. She has been growing rice for almost 10 years. Allen lacks the capital to sustain her farming activity. She requested a loan of 6,000 PHP to buy fertilizers and more rice seedlings and pay the laborer's fee to improve her harvest. In the future, Allen would like to expand her farming business to support the college education of her children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and more rice seedlings and pay the laborer's fee

loans.name: Lay

texts.en:
Lay is a married woman of 49 who currently lives with her spouse and two unmarried children in Baray District, Kampong Thom Province. She is dedicated to her farming business, growing rice and cassava on her own land. She feels glad and lucky to have the support of her spouse and children, who are helping her with the farming activities. Farming is the sole source of her income, and she has been doing it for nearly 25 years.

Lay intends to use the loan to buy wood to renovate her old house. For this reason, she applied for a loan amounting to KHR 3,000,000 through HKL, one of Kiva partners. She has had six loans from HKL and has been recognized as a client with a good credit history. She thanks the lenders for the loan support to help her family.

loans.use: to buy wood to renovate her old house.

loans.name: Muhibakhon

texts.ru: Мухибахону 37 лет. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Она работает врач -гинекологом. Ее муж трудовой мигрант в Российской Федерации. Мухибахон всегда мечтала дать высшее образование своим детям. Ее сын Азамджон в этом году окончил среднюю школу и поступил в Государственный Медицинский Университет Таджикистана. Азамджон отлично учился в средней школе и успешно поступил в университет. Мухибахон запрашивает займ на сумму 2600 долларов США для оплаты учебного договора. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Muhibakhon is 37 and married and raising three children. She works as a gynecologist and her husband is a migrant worker in Russia. Muhibakhon has always dreamed of offering her children a higher education. Her son Azamdzhon graduated from secondary school this year with excellent grades and has successfully enrolled in the State Medical University of Tajikistan. Muhibakhon is requesting a loan of US$2,600 to pay for his tuition. She awaits your kindness and hopes for your charity.

loans.use: To pay for her son's university tuition

loans.name: Iván Leonel

texts.es: Iván es una persona muy trabajadora quien se dedica a la fontanería, albañilería y a pintar casas, atendiendo trabajos a lo largo del país para poder llevar de esta manera el alimento y todo lo necesario a su hogar, donde vive junto a su esposa quien trabaja realizando los quehaceres del hogar y así mismo vive junto a su pequeño hijo de cinco años de edad. A pesar de trabajar tan duro y de todos sus esfuerzos, Iván no ha podido reunir el dinero necesario para cambiar el techo de su hogar, por lo que en cada lluvia su casa y familia se ve afectada, así mismo desea mandar a hacer un muro de contención ya que existen varios paredones de tierra que ponen en riesgo la vida de su familia. Es por esta razón que solicita un préstamo a FUSAI para poder contar con el dinero necesario para comprar dos docenas y media de láminas y también para comprar los materiales necesarios para iniciar la construcción del muro de contención. Con esto Iván brindará una vida mejor a su familia, estable y segura.
texts.en: Ivan is a hardworking person who works as a plumber, as a mason, and as a house painter.  He works all over the country so that he can feed and provide for the needs of his household, where he lives with his wife, who works as a housewife and cares for their five year old son.  Even though he has worked hard and made a great effort, Ivan has not been able to save up the money necessary to replace the roof on his home, so his family is affected whenever it rains.  He also wants to build a retention wall, since there are a number of dirt mounds that place his family at risk.  For this reason he is asking for a loan through FUSAI, to be able to have the money necessary to buy two and a half dozen sheets of metal and also to buy the materials needed to begin building the retention wall.  With this, Ivan will be able to provide his family with a better, more stable quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sheet metal.

loans.name: Anacleto

texts.en: Anacleto is a 55-year-old married man from Talibon, Bohol. He has 5 children. The oldest child is 23 while the younget is 8. He engages in fishing. He has been fishing for almost 10 years. He requested a loan of 23,000 PHP to buy fishing materials, such as fishing net, nylon and rope, to increase his catch and improve his earnings. In the future, Anacleto hopes that he can improve his fishing business to be successful so that he could provide his children with both good food and a quality education.

loans.use: to buy fishing materials like fishing net, nylon and  ropes

loans.name: Yesenia Marisol

texts.es:
Yesenia es una mujer de 37 años de edad, estudio hasta 9° grado, esta casada, y su esposo se dedica a la carpintería, tiene dos hijos con edades de 13 y 8 años están estudiando, solo vive con su esposo e hijos, solo los dos hijos depende de ella.

Lleva 10 años en el comercio de ropa, pasteles, frescos, pupusas etc, aprendió por intuición propia, antes solo comercializaba ropa, vende  sus productos por todo el cantón lo hace a pie, le apoyan sus hijos y lo hace de 1:00 p.m. a 5 p.m. todos los días. 

El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar ropa especialmente de mujer; ya que cuando anda con la venta de pasteles la gente le pregunta por ropa, así ella podrá aprovechar de vender las dos cosas y generar más ganancias.

Si todo le funciona con la ropa, espera tener un canal de comercio mas grande y dedicarse solo a esa actividad y así con las ganancias podrá mantener a sus hijos y ayudar a su esposo que se encuentra mal de salud.
texts.en:
Yesenia is a 37 year old woman. She studied until Grade Nine. She is married, her husband is a carpenter. She has two children, aged 13 and 8, who attend school. She lives with her husband and children and the children depend on her support. 

Yesenia has been selling clothes, pastries, soft drinks and pupusas (a traditional food) etc. for more than 10 years. She learned her trade by intuition, at first she only sold clothing. She sells throughout her canton on foot. Her children help her. She sells from 1pm until 5pm every day. 

Yesenia will use the loan to buy clothing, especially woman's clothing. While she is out selling pupusas, people ask her for clothing. So she can take advantage of this selling both things and increase her revenues. If the clothes selling goes well, she hopes to create a larger business and just sell clothes. She would use the revenue to support her children and help her husband as he has been sick.

loans.use: to buy clothing, mainly for women.

loans.name: German

texts.es:
German tiene 37 años de edad, solo estudio hasta noveno grado es acompañado y tiene 5 hijos. Se dedica  a la crianza de bovinos los cuales comercializa, tiene 17 años trabajar en la agricultura. Sus hijos le apoyan en el trabajo, desde las  4 de la madrugada  hasta las doce del día.

El cliente desde los 17 años es independiente en el trabajo y lo aprendió de su padre, antes se dedicaba al comercio. Camina 2km diarios hacia donde tiene el cultivo.

El crédito que esta solicitando es para comprar abono y prepara la tierra para sembrar 10,500 metros cuadrados de terreno. Así generara una cosecha que le sirva tanto para tener ingresos económicos e insumos en su hogar.

El cliente quiere tener una buena producción, que le permita vender una parte para honrar la deuda con la Fundacion Campo, y a la vez darle a sus hijos lo necesario para que puedan crecer, sanos, fuertes, y con una buena educación, y si es posible comprar un bovino que le quede de ganancia.
texts.en:
German is 37 years old. He only went to school up to the ninth grade. He is married and has 5 children. He raises cattle that he sells and has been working in agriculture for 17 years. His children help him in his work from 4 in the morning until 12 noon. 

This client has been on his own at work for 17 years. He learned it from his family. Previously he worked as a merchant. He works 2 km a day to where he has his crop.  

The loan that he is asking for is to buy fertilizer and to prepare the soil to plant 10,500 square meters of land. This way, he will generate a harvest that will be used for income and for home consumption.

The client wants to have a good yield that will allow him to sell a portion to pay off the debt with Fundacion Campo as well as give his children what they need to grow up healthy, strong and well educated, and if possible buy a cow for profit.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and to prepare the soil to plant 10,500 square meters of land.

loans.name: Nueva  Generacion - Sayllapata Group

texts.es:
Un grupo de pobladores en la comunidad de Sayllapata formaron el banco comunal “Nueva  Generacion - Sayllapata” en la provincia de Paucartambo desde este año 2013. En esta comunidad no existen industrias, empresas, bancos pero existen grandes terrenos de cultivos por lo tanto la mayoría de los pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería.    

Santusa tiene 51 años de edad y nació en el poblado de Sayllapata y vive en la misma comunidad, ella es una persona responsable y amable que sale adelante pues su actividad económica principal es la crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes, gallinas, chanchos y también se dedica a la agricultura entonces tiene varios terrenos de cultivos donde siembra papa, cebada, trigo y habas, ella en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar más animales menores como cuyes y gallinas para incrementar su capital de negocio.

Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos.

(La señora de falda roja es esposa de uno de los socios del banco comunal).

(La comunidad de Sayllapata está ubicado en el distrito de Colquepata de la provincia de Paucartambo del departamento del Cusco, Perú).
texts.en: A group of residents from the community of Sayllapata formed the "Nueva Generacion - Sayllapata" communal bank in the province of Paucartambo in 2013.  There are no industries, businesses or banks in the community.  However there are large agricultural fields, so the majority of the population works in agriculture and livestock farming.  Santusa is 51 years old, and was born and still lives in the community of Sayllapata. She is a responsible and friendly person who is successful in her principal economic activity, which is raising small animals such as guinea pigs, chickens and pigs, and also works in agriculture.  She has several fields where she grows potatoes, barley, wheat and broad beans.  She needs a loan now to buy more small animals such as guinea pigs and chickens, in order to increase her business capital.  The members are grateful for the opportunity provided and commit to making their respective repayments within the specified time period.  (The woman in the red skirt is the wife of one of the communal bank members.) (The community of Sayllapata is located in the Colquepata district, in the province of Paucartambo, in the department of Cusco, Peru.)

loans.use: to buy more small animals such as guinea pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Francisco Arnoldo

texts.es:
Francisco es un hombre de 54 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo grado, tiene 7 hijos, solo una hija vive con él esta estudiando enfermería.

Tiene 35 años de experiencia en la agricultura, desde que tenia 12 años;  lo aprendió a su padre que se dedicaba a lo mismo, también cría bovinos para la venta y toda la vida se ha dedicado a la agricultura, se levanta a las 4 de la madrugada todos los días y recorre una distancia de 1 km para su trabajo.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para preparara la tierra y compra de abono para cultivar maíz. Con esto  podrá aplicar los insumos a tiempo, para que la cosecha sea buena  y le permita asegurar el grano tanto para consumo familiar como para la venta. 

Él tiene la confianza de obtener una muy buena producción y ganancias ya que tiene dos hijos por graduarse y quiere apoyarles hasta en las últimas instancias, ya que ese siempre ha sido el sueño de él, y trabajar con bovinos en grandes cantidades.
texts.en:
Francisco is a 54 year old man. He went to school up to the second grade. He has 7 children and only one daughter lives with him. She is studying nursing. 

He has 35 years' experience. From the age of 12 he learned from his father who did the same work. He also raises cattle and has worked in agriculture all of his life. He gets up at 4 in the morning and travels 1 km to do his work.  

The loan he is asking for is to prepare the soil and to buy fertilizer to grow corn. With this he can apply the materials on time, so that the harvest will be good and allow him to ensure the grains for home consumption and to sell. 

He is confident he will obtain a very good yield and earnings, since he has two children who will graduate. He wants to support them to the end, since this has always been his dream, along with working with large quantities of cattle.

loans.use: to prepare the soil and buy fertilizer to grow corn.

loans.name: Ubadat

texts.ru: Убадат 44 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 5 детей. У Убадат - среднее образование. Убадат в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством, стартовав 20 лет назад, с покупки скота на 7,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Убадат, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 головы крупного рогатого скота, а также 10 голов мелкого рогатого скота, ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Убадат обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на увеличение поголовья скота за счет покупки крупного рогатого скота. Доходы от кредита Убадат планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, а также улучшить благосостояние семьи.
texts.en: Ubadat is 44 and married and, together with her husband, raising five children. Ubadat has a secondary education. As the primary income earner for her family, Ubadat works raising livestock, something she began 20 years ago with the purchase of cattle for 7,000 KGS. Thanks to Ubadat's hard work, her farm currently has two head of big-horned cattle as well as 10 head of small-horned cattle, with monthly earnings at 10,000 KGS. With the goal of further expanding her farm, Ubadat has turned to microfinance bank "Bai Tushum and Partners" for a loan of 100,000 KGS to increase her head count by purchasing big-horned cattle. Profits from the loan will be invested into increasing her household's number of cattle, as well as improving her family's well-being.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy goods for her business.

loans.name: Oyatullo

texts.ru: Оятулло  вырос в фермерской семье. Отец по профессии бухгалтер, имеет среднее -специальное образование, мать домохозяйка, в летнее время помогает мужу по фермерскому хозяйству. Оятулло является старшим ребенком в семье, есть сестра, которую выдали замуж и сестренка, она учится в школе. Все детство и юность Оятулло прошла в поселке, где основным доходом является скотоводство и выращивание скота, в свободное от занятий время он пас скот и помогал родителям. Он очень трудолюбивый и добросовестный молодой человек. Так как его родители не имели условия получить высшее образование и всегда мечтали о том, чтобы их сын  Оятулло получил высшее образование, потому, что он очень способный и хорошо учился в школе, не имел ни одной удовлетворительной оценки. И мечта родителей хоть и частично, но сбылась, Оятулло успешно сдал все вступительные экзамены и стал студентом Таджикского Государственного Университета Коммерции. Он должен оплатить за учебный договор, но не имеет денег. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 800 долларов США для оплаты учебного договора. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Oyatullo grew up in a farming family. His father is an bookkeeper with a specialist education at the secondary level and his mother is a homemaker who helps her husband in the summertime with the upkeep of the farm. He is the oldest child in the family; one of his sisters is married and the other is still in school. Oyatullo has spent his whole childhood and youth in a village where the primary industry is breeding and raising cattle and in his free time from studies he tended cattle and helped his parents.

Oyatullo is a hardworking and conscientious young man. Though his parents didn't have the means to receive a higher education, they always dreamed that their son would be able to attend university, as he is very capable and did well in school with above-average grades. His parents' dream has partially come true, as Oyatullo has successfully passed all his entry exams and become a student of the Tajik State Commerce University. He has to pay his tuition but does not have the money. He is requesting a loan for US$800 to pay his tuition. He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To pay for his university education

loans.name: Santa Rosalia Group

texts.es:
Un grupo de vecinos y amigos en el poblado de Pilcopata formaron el banco comunal “Santa Rosalia” en la provincia de Paucartambo desde hace varios años atrás y les va excelente. En este poblado no existen industrias, empresas, bancos pero existen grandes terrenos de cultivos por lo tanto la mayoría de los pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, a la venta de madera, al comercio y a la ganadería.   
 
Valeriana tiene 51 años de edad y vive en el poblado de Pilcopata, ella es una madre trabajadora que saca a delante a sus tres hijos a pesar de ser separada de su pareja. A pesar de las adversidades, ella es una persona responsable y amable que sale adelante pues su actividad económica principal es la venta de repuesto de motocicletas en una pequeña tienda que acomodo en su domicilio, ella en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar más repuestos como por ejemplo llantas pues es necesario para incrementar su capital de negocio.

Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos.
texts.en:
A group of friends and neighbors from the town of Pilcopata formed the “Santa Rosalia” communal bank in the Paucartambo province a few years ago and things have been excellent.  There are no industries, companies, or banks in this province, but there are large farmlands and therefore most of the residents are farmers, sell lumber, are merchants, or raise livestock.

Valeriana is 51 years old and lives in Pilcopata.  She is a hardworking mother who gets her three children ahead, despite being separated from her husband.  Despite all the adversities, she is a responsible and friendly person who gets ahead through her small motorcycle parts store located in her home.  She needs a loan to buy more spare parts such as tires, and she needs it to increase her working capital.

The members are grateful for the opportunity and they are committed to make their payments on time.

loans.use: to buy motorcycle parts.

loans.name: Edwin Edenilson

texts.es:
Edwin es un joven de 25 años de edad, estudio hasta séptimo grado, es acompañado y su esposa es ama de casa, ahorita no tiene hijos solo vive con ellos un niño que es de la esposa.

Desde hace 6 años trabaja en la agricultura, fue una actividad que aprendió de sus padres y luego se independizo. Ahora lo hace solo, dedicándose  a la agricultura y cría de bovinos; camina todos los días una media hora para llegar a su terreno en donde trabaja.

El préstamo le servirá para comprar  abono y  prepara la tierra para cultivar. De esta forma, tendrá una fuente de empleo que le genera ganancias, podrá sacar producto para la venta y para el consumo de su hogar.

Él desea continuar trabajando y año con año cultivar mas terreno, con el objetivo de generar ingresos para su hijo y comprar un bovino y tenerlo para que en un futuro sacarle ganancias.
texts.en: Edwin is 25 years old and went to school until the seventh grade.  He lives in a common-law relationship and his wife is a stay-at-home mother.  They have no children together, but his wife's child lives with them.  For 6 years he has worked in agriculture, which is an activity that he learned from his parents prior to becoming independent.  He now works alone in agriculture and raising cattle.  He walks for half an hour every day to arrive at the field where he works. The loan will be used to buy manure and to prepare the earth for cultivation.  In this way he can have a source of work that generates income, and will be able to produce products to sell and to consume at home.  He wants to be able to continue working, and to cultivate more land every year, with the goal of earning more income for his son, buying a cow and having it to produce future income.

loans.use: to buy manure and to prepare the earth for cultivation.

loans.name: Carmelo

texts.es: Carmelo tiene 4 años de habitar en la comunidad de las nubes # 2, en su humilde vivienda vive con sus esposa y cuatro hijos de los cuales tres de ellos asisten a la escuela de la comunidad y estan el hijo menor en cuarto grado de primaria y sus otros dos hijos mayores en secundaria. Carmelo dice que como cabeza pirncipal de la familia el todos los dias trabaja de sol a sol para que nos le falte el pan de cada dia a su hogar.En la comunidad aun no llega la energia comercial y es muy triste por las noches pues se iluminan con candiles, candelas  y phocos de baterias lo que sale mas caro . Es por eso que el solicita este credito para poder tener un sistema solar pequeño en su hogar lo que cambiara la vida de su familia e incluso de la misma comunidad.
texts.en: Carmelo has been living in this community, Las Bubes #2, for four years.  He lives in his humble home with his wife and four children, three of whom attend the community school.  The youngest is in fourth grade and the others in junior high school.  Carmelo says that as the head of the household, he works every day from sunup to sunset so that they will have their daily bread in their home.  There is no electricity in the community and it’s very sad at night, where the only light comes from candles or battery powered bulbs.  This is more expensive.  He is asking for this loan so he can buy a small solar power system.  This will change life for his family and for the community as a whole.

loans.use: to buy a solar power system.

loans.name: Reyna Belen

texts.es: Doña Reyna es una mujer trabajadora, habita en una comarca,  zona poco poblada de Managua. Es madre de tres hijos dos de ellos están en la universidad y uno en la escuela primaria, por lo que Reyna trabaja hasta altas horas de la noche, para poder entregar los pedidos de costuras de ropa a los clientes, labor que ejerce junto a su esposo, para ayudar a sus hijos, de esta manera salir adelante junto a su familia. El crédito que solicita es para comprar materiales para poner cielo raso en su casa de habitación, lo que le permitirá ir mejorando las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Reyna's a hardworking woman who lives in a sparsely populated area of Managua.  She's the mother of three children, two in college and one in elementary school.

Reyna works until late at night to be able to fulfill her customers' sewing requests.  She does this job with her husband to help her children and get her family ahead.

The loan she's requesting is to buy materials to install a ceiling in her house.  This will allow her to keep on improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy cement board and aluminum

loans.name: Gertrudis Alexandra

texts.es: Gertrudis, es una humilde mujer que busca salir adelante junto a sus dos hijos, uno estudia ingles y el otro la escuela secundaria, ella se dedica a la venta de bisuterías, ropa interior, sandalias, pero en la actualidad no cuenta con mucha variedad de productos que ofrecer a sus clientes, por lo que solicita el crédito para invertir en su pequeño negocio con productos de bisutería, como aretes cadenas, brazaletes, sandalias, de esta manera intenta dar vida a su negocio, que le permita en los ingresos de su familia.
texts.en:
Gertrudis is a modest woman who's trying to get ahead with her two children.  One of them studies English and the other one is in high school.

She makes a living selling costume jewelry, underwear, and sandals.  Currently she doesn't have a great variety of products to sell to her customers so she's requesting the loan to invest in her small business.

Gertrudis is going to buy jewelry such as earrings, necklaces, bracelets, and sandals.  She plans to give life to her business this way, allowing her to increase her family income.

loans.use: to buy costume jewelry and sandals

loans.name: Sonia Iris

texts.es:
Sonia cuenta con 28 años de edad, estudio hasta octavo grado, es casada, el esposo es empleado como seguridad, tiene dos hijos de 5 y 3 años, solamente la familia de ella vive en su casa, solo los dos hijos dependen de ella.

Tiene 4 años de dedicarse al comercio, fue su esposo quien la motivo para instalar la tienda, lo aprendieron solos, antes hacia oficios domésticos, pero ahora trabaja en su casa, el esposo la apoya cuando puede, permanece en su casa, todo el día pasa vendiendo.

El préstamo que esta solicitando es para comprar gas y venderlo en su tienda, pues en la zona no hay nadie quien lo distribuya y así tener una fuente más de ingreso.


Su objetivo es, fortalecer la tienda y abastecerla, para que sea la mas fuerte en la zona, y darle lo mejor a sus hijos, con las ganancias, poquito a poco piensa ir agrandando la tienda.
texts.en:
Sonia, 28, studied up to eighth grade.  She's married and her husband works in security.  She has two children, ages 5 and 3.  Only her family lives in her house and only her children are dependent on her.

She has been a merchant for four years.  Her husband inspired her to set up the store and they learned it on their own.  Previously she did domestic work but now she works at home.  Her husband helps her when he can.  She stays at home all day making sales.

The loan she's requesting is to buy gas to sell in her store.  Nobody distributes gas in her area, so she has an extra income.

Her goal is to strengthen and stock the store so it's the strongest in the area.  She also wants to give her children the best.  She plans to expand her store little by little with her profits.

loans.use: to buy gas

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en: Arlene is a 41-year-old married woman from Talibon, Bohol. She has two children. She runs a sari-sari (variety) store, where she sells various items like  bread, biscuits, cooking oil, noodles, soaps and toiletries. Arlene is in need of capital to maintain the store's inventory. She requested a loan of 14,000 PHP to buy a sack of rice, a sack of pollard (pig feed) and other various goods. In the future, Arlene would like to expand her sari-sari store to support the education of her children and also provide proper food and good living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a sack of rice, a sack of pollard (pig feed) and other various goods

loans.name: Jargalsaikhan

texts.en: Mrs. Jargalsaikhan, 34 years old, lives with her husband and children in Darkhan, the second largest city of Mongolia. The family resides in a house on a plot of land. Jargalsaikhan has been working as a water supply machinist at the water department since 2008. Her husband has been working as a welder at a power station for 10 years. She is requesting a loan of 800,000 MNT to purchase vacuum-insulated windows and bricks. After installing vacuum-insulated windows and layering the house with bricks, her family will live in a comfortable and warm place. Not losing heat through windows and walls will enable the family to burn less coal for heating and release fewer pollutants into air, thus contributing to the efforts against air pollution. The borrower is a very hard working individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to purchase vacuum-insulated windows and bricks

loans.name: Avelina

texts.en: Avelina is a 54-year-old married woman from Talibon, Bohol. She engages in farming. She grows and sells rice. During her leisure time, Avelina makes  native hats out of buri (palm) to augment her income. She has been growing rice for 10 years. To improve her harvest, she requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to buy two sacks of fertilizer and pay a laborer's fee. In the future, Avelina would like to expand her farming business to improve her family's living status.

loans.use: to buy two sacks of fertilizer and pay a laborer's fee

loans.name: Petrus

texts.en:
Petrus is a 45-year-old man who is married to Veronika, a 44-year-old woman. His wife is a housewife. They are blessed with five children: Maria, 20 years old, and Magdalena, 19 years old, both entrepreneurs; Markus, 17 years old, a high school student; Jordi, 8 years old, an elementary school student; and Jelita, 4 years old.

Petrus has been running a used clothing business since 2003. He started the business by using a group loan from TLM in amount of IDR 500,000. He buys the product from the supplier then resells it at his house, and sometimes he sells it out in the villages. He usually buys the used clothes in the amount of IDR 200,000 per bag. Sometimes the clothes are damaged so he has to repair them using his sewing machine. The sewing machine is one of the outcomes of his success in this business. 

Petrus desires to renovate his house, but he lacks the money to do so. Therefore, he requested an individual loan from TLM in amount of IDR 4,500,000. The loan will be used to buy the materials he needs to renovate his house, such as cement, sand, woven fiber wall, etc., and as additional capital for his business. He hopes that his business will run well so he will be able to repay the loan to TLM.

loans.use: to buy materials to renovate his house, such as cement, sand, woven fiber wall, and to use as additional capital for his business

loans.name: Malika

texts.ru: Малика молодая и очень активная девушка. Она родилась в городе Исфаре,пока не замужем и живет вместе с родителями. У неё есть также старший брат. Малика после окончания школы не смогла поступить в университет из-за финансовых проблем в семье. Поэтому она имеет среднее образование. Но после школы, она обучилась на курсах швеи и получила много знаний и опыта в этой сфере. Она очень талантливая и творческая девушка, любит предпринимательскую работу. Для того, чтобы помогать своим родителям, она решила начать свой маленький бизнес. Малика занимается шитьем и подготовкой занавесок под заказ. Также по заказу клиентов, используя свой талант занимается шитьем женских одежд. Она сотрудничает с Арванд с мая 2012 года и очень довольна разнообразной финансовой услугой Арванд. У нее перспективные взгляды на свою работу и она хочет развивать свою деятельность. На этот раз Малика решила упростить и усовершенствовать свою творческую деятельность путем приобретения современного высоко-технологического оборудования. Для этого она хочет купить новую современную швейную машинку, чтобы усовершенствовать свой бизнес. Поэтому, она обратилась в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку новой швейной машинки. Малика выражает свою благодарность Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Malika is a very active young woman.  She was born in the city of Isfara.  At present, she is unmarried and lives with her parents.  She also has an older brother.  After finishing high school, Malika was not able to enter into the university owing to the financial difficulties in her family.  However, after finishing school, she enrolled herself into courses to become a seamstress and obtained a lot of knowledge and experience in this field.  She is a very talented and an artistic young woman who enjoys entrepreneurial work.

In order to help her parents, she decided to start her own small business. Malika does sewing and preparation of curtains to order.  Also, at the behest of her clients, she uses her talent as a seamstress to make women’s clothes.  She has been collaborating with Arvand since May of 2012 and she is very happy with their various financial offerings.  She has high expectations for her future and she wants to develop her business.  

At this time, Malika has decided to simplify and to advance her creative endeavors by obtaining modern, high-tech equipment.  To improve her business, she wants to use a loan from Arvand to purchase a modern sewing machine.  Malika expresses her gratitude to Arvand for their support.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Benda

texts.en: Benda is a 64-year-old single woman from Talibon, Bohol. She runs a sari-sari (variety) store. She sells various items like eggs, dried fish, cooking oil, sugar, noodles, canned goods and detergents. She has been  running a store for almost five years. She requested a loan of 6,000 PHP to buy a sack of rice, seasonings and other various goods. In the future, Benda would like to expand her sari-sari store to maintain the inventory of the store, provide proper diets and a sustainable income.

loans.use: to buy a sack of rice, seasonings and other various goods to sell

loans.name: María Martha

texts.es:
En Los Bajos de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su gran diversidad de productos típicos, como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país se reúnen cada 15  días las socias del Banco Comunal 4 De Noviembre.

En este lugar vive la señora María, tiene 53 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen siete hijos mayores de edad, tres de ellos aun vive con ella. Su esposo trabaja ocasionalmente.

Doña María con la intención de ganar algo por su cuenta y con esto poder salir adelante ya que su esposo no tiene un trabajo fijo se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su  casa donde tiene un pequeño local, trabaja todos los días y su esposo le ayuda cuando él puede sobre todo cuando tiene que ir a cobrar ya que deja a crédito y  cobra cada ocho días. Tiene más de 5 años que se dedica a esta actividad la cual le deja lo necesario para salir adelante y esto gracias a los créditos.

Este crédito lo va invertir en la compra de pantalones, blusas, camisetas y ropa de niños. Está en el Banco Comunal desde hace 5 años  y le gusta porque con el primer crédito empezó su negocio. 

Su sueño es seguir adelante
texts.en:
In the lower parts of Montecristi - a city known for its great diversity of traditional products; for example, the straw hats known within and outside of the country – the members of the communal bank “4 De Noviembre" (4th of November) meet every 15 days. 

In this place lives María. She is 53 years old and is married. From this marriage, they have 7 grown children, three of whom who live with them. Her husband works occasionally. 

María works selling all types of clothing with the aim of earning something for her financial account, and with this, being able to get ahead, since her husband doesn’t have steady work. Her method of selling is door-to-door, and she also sells from her house, where she has a small shop. 

She works every day, and her husband helps her when he can – above all, when she has to go collect her earnings, since she uses credit and collects every eight days. She has been doing this work for more than 5 years, and it gives her what she needs to get ahead, thanks to the loans.

She will invest this loan in the purchase of pants, blouses, T-shirts, and children’s clothing. She has been in the communal bank for 5 years, and she enjoys it, because she used the first loan to start her business.

Her dream is to continue moving forward.

loans.use: to purchase pants, blouses, T-shirts, and children’s clothing.

loans.name: María Alexandra

texts.es:
En Los Bajos de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su gran diversidad de productos típicos, como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país se reúnen cada 15  días las socias del Banco Comunal 4 De Noviembre.

En este lugar vive la señora María, tiene 42 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de  17, 16 y 14 años que  estudian en colegio. Su esposo se dedica al comercio.

Doña María para poder ayudarle a su esposo a solventar los gastos del hogar hace varios años empezó un negocio, ella tiene un pequeño comedor en su casa, en el cual prepara deliciosos platos, trabaja todos los días desde las 06h00 hasta las  a las tres de la tarde. En  las mañanas preparar el delicioso ceviche de pescado y camarón plato muy apetecido por sus clientes y en el almuerzo siempre varia el menú para satisfacer a sus clientes que llegan a diario ya que saben lo delicioso que ella cocina.

Este crédito es para comprar pescado, camarón y otros víveres necesarios  para la preparación de los alimentos. Está desde el inicio en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que siempre le brindan los créditos. 

Su sueño es darles una buena educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
In the lower parts of Montecristi - a city known for its great diversity of traditional products; for example, the straw hats known within and outside of the country – the members of the communal bank “4 De Noviembre (4th of November) meet every 15 days. 

In this place lives María. She is 42 years old and is married. From this marriage they have three children ages 17, 16, and 14 years, who are in high school. Her husband is a businessman. 

In order to help her husband to pay the household expenses, María started her own business some years ago. She has a small restaurant in her house where she prepares delicious dishes. 

She works every day from 6:00 until three in the afternoon. In the mornings, she makes a delicious fish and shrimp ceviche – a dish that her customers love – and for lunch, she always varies the menu to satisfy her customers who come every day, since they know what delicious food she cooks. 

This loan is to purchase fish, shrimp, and other necessary supplies for preparing her food. She has been with the Communal Bank since the beginning, and she likes it because of the help that the loans always offer. 

Her dream is to give her children a good education.

loans.use: to purchase fish, shrimp, and other supplies.

loans.name: Julius

texts.en:
Julius is a 47-year-old man who is married to Vera, a 38-year-old woman. They have been blessed with a son, Jason, 4 months old. Julius is a civil servant, and his wife is an entrepreneur.

He has just bought a house to live in with his family nearby his old house. He gave his old house away to his parents to live in. He wants to build a garage in his new house and help his mother to run a kiosk business at the old house, but he does not have enough money to do so; therefore, he is requesting an individual loan from TLM in the amount of 10,000,000 IDR (Indonesian rupiah). The loan will be spent to buy some kiosk stock such as soap, detergent, snacks, etc., and also to purchase the material to build his garage. He hopes that the kiosk business will be improved with the loan provided by TLM.

loans.use: to buy some kiosk stock such as soap, detergent, snacks, etc., and also to purchase the material to build his garage.

loans.name: Munkhtsetseg

texts.en:
Mrs. Munkhtsetseg, 27 years old, lives with her husband, son and parents in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. They all live in a small wooden house on a plot of land. She has been working as a cashier at a supermarket for two years. 

Recently, she and her husband began building a house next to their old house. But due to lack of finances, she can't afford to buy the necessary building materials such as bricks, cement, shingles, windows, doors and hardwood floors. If she finishes building her house before winter, her parents and her family can live in a comfortable and warm place respectively. Because all of them live in a small house, they are required to burn lots of coal for heating and release pollutants greatly, which has an adverse effect on the environment. Living in separate houses will create a comfortable and warm place. The borrower is a very hardworking individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to purchase building materials.

loans.name: Enkhtuul

texts.en:
Mrs. Enkhtuul, 39 years old, lives with her husband and son in Erdenet, the third largest city of Mongolia. The family resides in a house on a plot of land. Her husband is currently unemployed and seeking a job. Her son is in fifth grade at high school. She herself has been selling various goods to local people by renting a stall at an outdoor market since 2011. 

She is requesting a loan of 3,500,000 MNT (Mongolian tugriks) to purchase goods such as sneakers, felt products and clothes from her suppliers in Ulaanbaatar. As a result, she can continue to run her business without worrying about inventory shortage. The borrower is a very hardworking individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to purchase goods such as sneakers, felt products and clothes from suppliers.

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en: Rosalinda earns a living through her sari-sari or retail store business. She lives with her family in the town of Corella, Bohol. Rosalinda is asking for a loan to buy groceries to sell in her store like canned goods, biscuits and snack foods, soda and beverages, noodles, cooking seasoning and other items. Through this loan, Rosalinda will be able to improve her stock, thus attracting more buyers in her store. She dreams of expanding her store so that she will be able to cater to more customers.

loans.use: to buy groceries to sell in her store like canned goods, biscuits and snack foods, soda and beverages, noodles, cooking seasoning and other items.

loans.name: Erdenebulgan

texts.en:
Mrs. Erdenebulgan, 50 years old, lives with her husband and younger son in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. They live in a house on a plot of land, and next to them, her elder son lives with his family in a Mongolian traditional ger (portable felt dwelling). 

She and her husband have the same profession and have worked at the same power station as reinforced concrete makers for 30 years. She is requesting a loan of 3,500,000 MNT (Mongolian tugriks) to purchase building and insulation materials such as bricks, cement, planks, fiberglass and foam. After the house renovation, her family will live in a comfortable and warm place where they don't need to burn much coal for heating, and will release less pollutants, thus contributing to the efforts against air pollution.

loans.use: to purchase building and insulation materials.

loans.name: Benkadi (L’Entente) Group

texts.fr:
Benkadi est un regroupement de femmes du quartier Médina Coura de la ville de Koutiala qui se connaissent bien et qui  vivent dans de grandes familles traditionnelles avec leurs maris, enfants et autres parents. Elles ont en moyenne 35 ans, sont mariées et ont au moins 3 enfants.
Ce groupe de femmes fait le commerce d’articles divers tels, les habits, les ustensiles, etc. 
Pour augmenter la taille de leurs activités, les membres ont décidé d’intégrer le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso. Elles sont à leur deuxième prêt de groupe. 
Mariam est un membre du groupe Benkadi debout en  première position de la gauche vers la droite.  
Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter des ustensiles de cuisine de toutes sortes. Elle se procure de ces articles  au grand marché. Elle vend ces articles en détail et au comptant à la maison et au marché et à une clientèle diverse. 
Tandis que les autres membres du groupe Benkadi comptent réaliser un bénéfice  moyen de 30 000 CFA  Mariam compte réaliser  40 000FCFA.  
En plus du remboursement des prêts, elles utilisent une partie du revenu  pour faire face aux dépenses personnel et augmenter son fond de commerce.
texts.en:
Benkadi is a group of women from the Medina Coura district of the city of Koutiala, who know each other well and who live in large traditional families with their husbands, children and other relatives. They average 35 years old, are married and have at least three children.

This group of women sells sundries such as clothes, utensils, etc. To increase the size of their operations, the members decided to join the Soro Yiriwaso loan program. They are on their second group loan.

Mariam is the member of the Benkadi group who is standing in first position from left to right. She plans to use the loan to buy all kinds of cooking utensils. She obtains these products at the grand market. She then retails these items for cash either at home or in the market to a diversified clientele.

Whereas other members of the Benkadi group expect to achieve average profits of 30,000 FCFA, Mariam expects to achieve 40,000 FCFA.

In addition to repaying the loans, they use some of the income to meet personal expenses and increase their stock supply.

loans.use: buy kitchen utensils

loans.name: Dambe Group

texts.fr:
Dambe est un regroupement de femmes du quartier Darsalam1 de la ville de Koutiala qui  vivent dans de grandes familles traditionnelles avec leurs maris, enfants et autres parents. Elles ont en moyenne 46 ans, sont mariées et ont au moins 7 enfants.
Ce groupe de femmes fait le commerce d’articles divers tels, le bois de chauffe les condiments, les poissons, etc. 
Pour augmenter la taille de leurs activités, les membres ont décidé d’intégrer le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso. Elles sont à leur cinquième prêt de groupe. 
Aminata  est un membre du groupe debout en  2eme position à gauche.  
Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter des cartons de poissons de toutes sortes. Elle se procure de ses articles  à Koutiala. Elle vend en détail et au comptant à la maison et au marché et à une clientèle diverse. 
Tandis que les autres membres du groupe Dambe comptent réaliser un bénéfice  moyen de 20 500 CFA  chacune au  cours de ce cycle Mme Aminata compte réaliser  25 000FCFA.  
En plus du remboursement des prêts, elles utilisent une partie du revenu  pour faire face aux dépenses personnel et augmenter son fond de commerce.
texts.en:
Dambe is a group of women from the Darsalam1 district of the city of Koutiala, who live in large traditional families with their husbands, children and other relatives. They are on average 46 years old, married and have at least seven children.

This group of women sells sundries such as firewood, condiments, fish, etc. To increase the size of their operations, the members decided to join the Soro Yiriwaso loan program. They are on their fifth group loan.

Aminata is the member of the group standing in second position from the left. She plans to use the loan to buy cartons of all kinds of fish. She gets her products in Koutiala. She then retails for cash either at home or at the market to a diversified clientele.

While other members of the Dambe group expect an average profit of 20,500 FCFA each during this loan cycle, Aminata expects to achieve 25,000 FCFA.

In addition to repaying the loans they use some of the income to meet personal expenses and increase their stock supply.

loans.use: buy fish

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en: Carmelita is a 46 year old married woman from Talibon, Bohol. She is a mother of 2 children aged 15 and 10. She runs a sari-sari (variety) store. She sells various commodities like cooking oil, noodles, shampoo, canned goods, coffee, seasonings and toiletries. Her husband is a farmer .She has been running this store for almost 5 years. To be able to continue her business operations,  she requests a loan of 6,000 PHP to buy soft drinks, noodles, soap and a sack of rice. In the future, Carmelita hopes to be successful in her sari- sari store business so she can afford the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, noodles, soap and  a sack of rice

loans.name: Edisa

texts.en: Edisa is a 44 year old married woman from Talibon, Bohol. She has 3 children aged 24,19 and 15. She engages in fishing and sells her catch. She has been fishing for almost 10 years. Due to lack of materials that is very essential in her daily work, she requests a loan of  10,000 PHP to buy fishing nets, nylon, floaters and lift weights. In the future, Edisa hopes that out of the profits she earned, she would be able to purchase a new fishing boat and continue to support the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets, nylon, floaters and lift weights

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en: Carmelita is a 27 year married woman from Talibon, Bohol.  She has 3 children aged 9,8 and 1. She engages in fishing and sells her catch. She has been selling fish for almost 5 years. Her husband is a  fisherman. They work together to provide the various needs of the family. She requests a loan of 5,000 PHP to buy materials for boat repairs like ply wood, epoxy (adhesive) and nails.This will help Carmelita improve her standard of living. In the future, Carmelita would like to expand her fishing business to support the needs of her growing children.

loans.use: to buy materials for boat repairs like  ply wood, epoxy (adhesive) and nails

loans.name: Editha

texts.en: Editha is a 49 year old married woman from Talibon, Bohol. She has 8 young children. She makes and sells charcoal. She also sells fish to bring in additional income. She has been making charcoal for almost 2 years. She requested a loan of 3,000 PHP to buy more empty coconut shells, fishing nets and 10 sacks for charcoal. In the future, Editha hopes to expand both her businesses to support the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy more empty coconut shell, fishing nets and 10 sacks for charcoal to sell

loans.name: Teodora

texts.en:
Teodora is a 59 year old married woman and a mother of three grown up children. Teodora is engaged in hog raising and has been doing this for more than 6 years now. This is the only source of her income.
Teodora is asking for  a loan to buy additional piglets to raise and feed for the pigs. With this, she will be able to improve her hog raising venture thus augmenting her profit and income. In the future, Teodora hopes of making her business a success.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets to raise and feed for the pigs

loans.name: Fuatino

texts.en:
Fuatino is a 31-year-old who lives with her partner and 3 children. 
She has a small plantation and grows taro and banana to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. Fuatino has requested a loan to buy a backpack sprayer, chemicals, safety boots, gloves, taro roots and barbed wire. 
Fuatino joined SPBD in 2013 to gain access to financial services. With her profits, Fuatino will save for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy a backpack sprayer, chemicals, safety boots, gloves, taro roots and barbed wire

loans.name: Eduardo

texts.en: Eduardo is a 45-year-old married man from Talibon, Bohol. A father of a 9-year-old daughter, Eduardo toils the land and grows rice. He has been growing rice for almost 10 years. He requested a loan of 5000 PHP to buy fertilizer, rice seedlings and pay a laborer's fee, to improve his yield. Eduardo hopes that he could expand his farming business to support the need of his growing child.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, rice seedlings and pay a laborer's fee

loans.name: Ermelinda

texts.en: Ermelinda is a 39-year-old married woman from Talibon, Bohol. She has 9 children. The oldest is 17 while the youngest is 7 months old. Ermelinda runs a sari-sari (variety) store. She sells various items like soft drinks, juice, biscuits, noodles, dishwashing liquid and soap. Ermelinda has been running a store for almost 10 years. Aside from running a store, Ermelinda goes fishing. She sells fish to augment her income. Ermelinda requested a loan of 6000 PHP to buy fishing nets, lift weights and various stock for the store. In the future, Ermelinda hopes that she could expand both her businesses to support the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets, lift weights and various stock

loans.name: Agness

texts.en: Agness lives in Mombasa, Kenya. She is 28 years old and she is single. Agness was employed before she started her own business. During the time that she was employed, Agness made her own savings that helped her start the book store. She knew of Milango through friends and decided to join so that she could access credit to fund her business. Agness now seeks a loan to buy a photocopy machine for her business. She has a vision of growing her business to become a wholesale business in the next five years. The challenges in the business are inflation and the high prices of goods. The extra income that she will raise from the business will be ploughed back into the business until it is stable enough.

loans.use: to buy a photocopy machine

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en:
Carmelita is a farmer from the town of San Miguel, Bohol. She has been in the farming business for more than 20 years now. This is the source of her income.
Carmelita is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer and pesticides, and to pay the labor cost of the farm. With this, she will be able to improve the productivity of the farm thus augmenting her yield and profit. In the future, Carmelita hopes of expanding her farming venture and making it a sustainable source of income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides, and to pay the labor cost of the farm

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tomatoes, cabbages and kale

loans.name: Elvira

texts.en:
Elvira is a farmer from the town of San Miguel, Bohol. She is a married woman and has five children. She has been in the farming business for more than 15 years now, together with her husband. This is the source of their income.
Elvira is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer and pesticides, and to pay the labor cost of the farm. With this, Elvira will be able to improve the productivity of farm, thus augmenting her yield and income. In the future, Elvira hopes of making her business a success and a sustainable source of income. In addition, Elvira wants to save money for the schooling of her children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides, and to pay the labor cost of the farm

loans.name: Felipa

texts.en: Felipa is a 48-year-old married woman from Talibon, Bohol. She has 2 children aged 17 and 25. Felipa runs a sari-sari (variety) store. She sells items like coffee, biscuits, condiments, soaps, soft drinks and canned goods. Felipa requested a loan of 6000 PHP to buy 5 cases of soft drinks, beverages and various other goods. Felipa hopes that she could manage her store well in order to provide her children with good food and quality education.

loans.use: to buy 5 cases of soft drinks, beverages and various other goods

loans.name: Iokapeta

texts.en: Iokapeta is 31 years old and lives with her partner for four years. They have three children. She owns and operates a taxi business venture. She has five years of experience in this line of business. Iokapeta needs a loan to buy new tires and a taxi sign, and re-new the vehicle's license. She hopes to use her profits to help her family and pay for her children's education. She joined SPBD in 2010.

loans.use: to buy new tires and a taxi sign, and re-new the vehicle's license.

loans.name: Aricky

texts.en: Aricky is 38 years old. He is not married and he is employed as a driver. He owns a retail shop that he has employed someone to manage on his behalf. He says that he hopes the business will grow to be larger. The major challenges that he faces in the business are the high prices of commodities and inflation. He heard of Milango through friends and now he seeks a loan to buy retail products such as cereals, bread, milk, flour and other goods for the shop. The extra income from the loan will improve his living standards and also help his sister to educate her children. The children are in his care; therefore, the benefit of the business will roll down to his nephews.

loans.use: to buy retail products such as cereals, bread, milk, flour and other goods.

loans.name: Fernanda

texts.en: Fernanda is a 53-year-old married woman from Talibon, Bohol. She does farming. She grows and sells rice to earn a living. She has been growing rice for more than 10 years. She requested a loan of 6,000 PHP to buy fertilizer and pesticides. In the future, Fernanda would like to expand her farming business to improve their livelihood status and purchase a new hand tractor, which is very helpful in plowing the field.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides for her rice farming business.

loans.name: Vaine

texts.en: Vaine is a 41-year-old woman who is single with six children. She runs a business of Elei printing and sewing clothes in her community. She has three years of experience with this business. Vaine has requested a loan to buy a sewing machine, threads, materials, needles, fabric paints, carved Elei designs, stencils, and brushes. She plans to use her profit to expand her business. She joined SPBD in 2010 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine, threads, materials, needles, fabric paints, carved Elei designs, stencils, and brushes for her sewing business.

loans.name: Estrellita

texts.en:
